009package imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.geometric;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.isZero;
012import static java.lang.Math.hypot;
013import static org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresFactory.evaluationChecker;
014
015import java.util.LinkedList;
016import java.util.List;
017
018import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresFactory;
019import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresOptimizer;
020import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresOptimizer.Optimum;
021import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresProblem;
022import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer;
023import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.MultivariateJacobianFunction;
024import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.Array2DRowRealMatrix;
025import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.ArrayRealVector;
026import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix;
027import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector;
028import org.apache.commons.math3.optim.SimpleVectorValueChecker;
029import org.apache.commons.math3.util.Pair;
030
031import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
032import imagingbook.common.geometry.circle.GeometricCircle;
033
034/**
035 * <p>
036 * "Distance-based" geometric circle fitter using a nonlinear least-squares 
037 * (Levenberg-Marquart) optimizer.
038 * See [1, Sec. 11.1.3] for a detailed description (Alg. 11.3).
039 * </p>
040 * <p>
041 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing - An Algorithmic Approach</em>, 
042 * 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
043 * </p>
044 * 
045 * @author WB
046 */
047public class CircleFitGeometricDist implements CircleFitGeometric {
048        
049        public static final int DefaultMaxIterations = 1000;
050        public static final double DefaultTolerance = 1e-6;
051        
052        private final Pnt2d[] pts;
053        private final double[] V;
054        private final double[][] J;
055        private final Optimum solution;
056        private final List<double[]> history = new LinkedList<>();
057        
058        public CircleFitGeometricDist(Pnt2d[] pts, GeometricCircle initCircle) {
059                this(pts, initCircle, DefaultMaxIterations, DefaultMaxIterations, DefaultTolerance);
060        }
061        
062        public CircleFitGeometricDist(Pnt2d[] pts, GeometricCircle initCircle, int maxEvaluations, int maxIterations, double tolerance) {
063                this.pts = pts;
064                this.V = new double[pts.length];
065                this.J = new double[pts.length][3];
066                
067                LeastSquaresProblem problem = 
068                                LeastSquaresFactory.create(
069                                        new AnalyticModel(), // model(V, J), 
070                                        new ArrayRealVector(pts.length),                // zero vector
071                                        new ArrayRealVector(initCircle.getParameters()),
072                                        evaluationChecker(new SimpleVectorValueChecker(tolerance, tolerance)),
073                                        maxEvaluations, maxIterations);
074                
075                LeastSquaresOptimizer optimizer = new LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer();    // new GaussNewtonOptimizer();  
076                this.solution = optimizer.optimize(problem);
077        }
078        
079
080        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
081
082        @Override
083        public double[] getParameters() {
084                return solution.getPoint().toArray();
085        }
086        
087        @Override
088        public int getIterations() {
089                return solution.getIterations();
090        }
091        
092        @Override
093        public List<double[]> getHistory() {
094                return history;
095        }
096        
097        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
098    
099    /**
100     * Defines function {@link #value(RealVector)} which returns
101     * the vector of model values and the associated Jacobian matrix
102     * for a given parameter point.
103     */
104    class AnalyticModel implements MultivariateJacobianFunction {
105
106                @Override
107                public Pair<RealVector, RealMatrix> value(RealVector point) {
108                        final double[] p = point.toArray();
109                        if (RecordHistory) {
110                                history.add(p.clone());
111                        }
112                        
113                        final double xc = p[0], yc = p[1], r  = p[2];
114                        for (int i = 0; i < pts.length; i++) {
115                                double dx = xc - pts[i].getX();
116                                double dy = yc - pts[i].getY();
117                                double ri = hypot(dx, dy);
118                                
119                                // values:
120                                V[i] = ri - r;
121                                
122                                // Jacobian:
123                                if (isZero(ri)) {       // (xi,yi) is at the circle center
124                                        J[i][0] = 0;    // (xc - xi) = 0 too
125                                        J[i][1] = 0;    // (yc - yi) = 0 too
126                                } else {
127                                        J[i][0] = dx / ri;
128                                        J[i][1] = dy / ri;
129                                }
130                                J[i][2] = -1;
131                        }
132                        RealVector VV = new ArrayRealVector(V, false);
133                        RealMatrix JJ = new Array2DRowRealMatrix(J, false);
134                        return new Pair<>(VV, JJ);
135                }
136        
137    }
138    
139    
140    
141    // -------------------------------------------------------------------

187}
